languages.text: "Женская особь, обладающая крайне крепкой связью с вуалью, а также редкими для мон-кай мутациями, в частности — третьим глазом? Я проверяю, как повлияет полная изоляция от вуали и внешнего мира на способности, рассудок и физическое состояние образца. Она уже не кричит в своем резервуаре, но еще, несомненно, жива, так что я пока не готов прекратить эксперимент".

traits.locale_text: "Посмотрим… Удивительный эксперимент! Женская особь, обладает крайне крепкой связью с вуалью, а также редкими для мон-кай мутациями, в частности — третьим глазом. Как повлияет полная изоляция от вуали и внешнего мира на способности, рассудок и физическое состояние объекта? Исход непредсказуем!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "The female with an exceptionally strong connection to the veil as well as a number of rare mon-keigh mutations, most notably a third eye? I am studying the influence of complete isolation from the veil and the outside world on the specimen's abilities, sanity, and physical condition. She no longer screams inside her reservoir, but she is certainly still alive, and I am not yet ready to conclude the experiment."
languages.original_text: "Женская особь, обладающая крайне крепкой связью с вуалью, а также редкими для мон-кай мутациями, в частности — третьим глазом? Я проверяю, как повлияет полная изоляция от вуали и внешнего мира на способности, рассудок и физическое состояние образца. Она уже не кричит в своем резервуаре, но еще, несомненно, жива, так что я пока не готов прекратить эксперимент".

traits.locale_text: "The female who possesses an exceptionally strong connection to the veil as well as a number of mutations that are rare in mon-keigh, such as a third eye? I am conducting a test to study the influence of complete isolation from the veil and the outside world on the specimen's abilities, sanity, and physical state. She is no longer screaming inside her reservoir, but I am quite certain that she is still alive, and thus I am not yet ready to conclude the experiment."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "The female who possesses an exceptionally strong connection to the veil as well as a number of mutations that are rare in mon-keigh, such as a third eye? I categorically deny. I am conducting a test to study the influence of complete isolation from the veil and the outside world on the specimen's abilities, sanity, and physical state. She is no longer screaming inside her reservoir, but I am quite certain that she is still alive, and thus I am not yet ready to conclude the experiment."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

She no longer screams inside her reservoir, but she is certainly still alive, and I am not yet ready to conclude the experiment."

She no longer screams inside her reservoir, but she is certainly still alive, and I am not yet ready to conclude the experiment."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "The female with an exceptionally strong connection to the veil as well as a number of rare mon-keigh mutations, most notably a third eye? I am studying the influence of complete isolation from the veil and the outside world on the specimen's abilities, sanity, and physical condition. She no longer screams inside her reservoir, but she is certainly still alive, and I am not yet ready to conclude the experiment."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: « La femelle dotée d'un lien étonnamment puissant au voile, de diverses mutations mon-keigh, dont un troisième œil ? Je suis en train d'étudier les conséquences d'un isolement complet du voile et du monde extérieur sur les capacités ainsi que la santé mentale et physique de ce spécimen. Elle a cessé de hurler dans son caisson, mais elle est encore vivante. Je n'ai pas l'intention d'interrompre mon expérience. »
languages.original_text: "The female with an exceptionally strong connection to the veil as well as a number of rare mon-keigh mutations, most notably a third eye? I am studying the influence of complete isolation from the veil and the outside world on the specimen's abilities, sanity, and physical condition. She no longer screams inside her reservoir, but she is certainly still alive, and I am not yet ready to conclude the experiment."

traits.locale_text: « La femelle dotée d'un lien étonnamment puissant au voile, de diverses mutations mon-keigh, dont un troisième œil ? Je suis en train d'étudier les conséquences d'un isolement complet du voile et du monde extérieur sur les capacités ainsi que la santé mentale et physique de ce spécimen. Elle a cessé de hurler dans son caisson, mais elle est encore vivante. Je n'ai pas l'intention d'interrompre mon expérience. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: “是那个与面纱有着紧密的女性吗？她有着罕见的猴子变异，还长着第三只眼睛。我现在正在研究，如果把那个实验对象与面纱之间的联系彻底切断，会对她的力量、理性与身体状况产生什么样的影响。她之前在囚室里放声尖叫，现在已经不叫了，但她肯定还活着。我还没打算结束这场实验呢。”
languages.original_text: "The female with an exceptionally strong connection to the veil as well as a number of rare mon-keigh mutations, most notably a third eye? I am studying the influence of complete isolation from the veil and the outside world on the specimen's abilities, sanity, and physical condition. She no longer screams inside her reservoir, but she is certainly still alive, and I am not yet ready to conclude the experiment."

traits.locale_text: “是那个与面纱有着紧密的女性吗？她有着罕见的猴子变异，还长着第三只眼睛。我现在正在研究，如果把那个实验对象与面纱之间的联系彻底切断，会对她的力量、理性与身体状况产生什么样的影响。她之前在囚室里放声尖叫，现在已经不叫了，但她肯定还活着。我还没打算结束这场实验呢。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Die Frau mit einer außergewöhnlich starken Verbindung zum Schleier sowie einiger seltener Chem-Pan-Sey-Mutationen, insbesondere einem dritten Auge? Ich studiere den Einfluss völliger Isolation vom Schleier und der Außenwelt auf die Fähigkeiten sowie den geistigen und körperlichen Zustand des Versuchsstücks. Sie schreit nicht mehr, in ihrem Reservoir, ist aber noch am Leben, und ich bin noch nicht bereit, das Experiment zu beenden."
languages.original_text: "The female with an exceptionally strong connection to the veil as well as a number of rare mon-keigh mutations, most notably a third eye? I am studying the influence of complete isolation from the veil and the outside world on the specimen's abilities, sanity, and physical condition. She no longer screams inside her reservoir, but she is certainly still alive, and I am not yet ready to conclude the experiment."

traits.locale_text: "Die Frau mit einer außergewöhnlich starken Verbindung zum Schleier sowie einiger seltener Chem-Pan-Sey-Mutationen, insbesondere einem dritten Auge? Ich studiere den Einfluss völliger Isolation vom Schleier und der Außenwelt auf die Fähigkeiten sowie den geistigen und körperlichen Zustand des Versuchsstücks. Sie schreit nicht mehr, in ihrem Reservoir, ist aber noch am Leben, und ich bin noch nicht bereit, das Experiment zu beenden."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: «¿La hembra que tiene una conexión excepcionalmente fuerte con el velo? Además de unas peculiares mutaciones mon-keigh, especialmente un tercer ojo. Estoy estudiando cómo le afecta el aislamiento total del velo y del mundo exterior a sus habilidades, cordura y condición física. Ya ha dejado de gritar dentro de su tanque, pero sigue viva, y el experimento todavía no ha terminado».
languages.original_text: "The female with an exceptionally strong connection to the veil as well as a number of rare mon-keigh mutations, most notably a third eye? I am studying the influence of complete isolation from the veil and the outside world on the specimen's abilities, sanity, and physical condition. She no longer screams inside her reservoir, but she is certainly still alive, and I am not yet ready to conclude the experiment."

traits.locale_text: «¿La hembra que tiene una conexión excepcionalmente fuerte con el velo? Además de unas peculiares mutaciones mon-keigh, especialmente un tercer ojo. Estoy estudiando cómo le afecta el aislamiento total del velo y del mundo exterior a sus habilidades, cordura y condición física. Ya ha dejado de gritar dentro de su tanque, pero sigue viva, y el experimento todavía no ha terminado».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: 「ヴェールとの結びつきが非常に強い女で、モン＝ケイの数ある突然変異の中でも特に第三の目を持っている。私は、ヴェールや外界から完全に隔離されることが、標本の能力、正気度、体調に与える影響を研究している。彼女は、もう貯水池の中で悲鳴を上げることはないが、まだ確かに生きているし、私もまだ実験を終える気はない」
languages.original_text: "The female with an exceptionally strong connection to the veil as well as a number of rare mon-keigh mutations, most notably a third eye? I am studying the influence of complete isolation from the veil and the outside world on the specimen's abilities, sanity, and physical condition. She no longer screams inside her reservoir, but she is certainly still alive, and I am not yet ready to conclude the experiment."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴェールとの結びつきが非常に強い女で、モン＝ケイの数ある突然変異の中でも特に第三の目を持っている。私は、ヴェールや外界から完全に隔離されることが、標本の能力、正気度、体調に与える影響を研究している。彼女は、もう貯水池の中で悲鳴を上げることはないが、まだ確かに生きているし、私もまだ実験を終える気はない」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Örtüyle özellikle güçlü bir bağlantısı bulunması dışında, mon-keighlerde nadir görülen çok sayıda mutasyona ve hatta üçüncü bir göze sahip dişiyi mi diyorsun? Örtüden ve dış dünyadan tamamen izole olmasının; numunenin yeteneklerine, akıl sağlığına ve fiziksel durumuna etkilerini inceliyorum. Mahzeninden artık çığlıklar yükselmiyor ancak hâlâ hayatta olduğu kesin. Ayrıca henüz deneyimi sonlandırmaya hazır değilim."
languages.original_text: "The female with an exceptionally strong connection to the veil as well as a number of rare mon-keigh mutations, most notably a third eye? I am studying the influence of complete isolation from the veil and the outside world on the specimen's abilities, sanity, and physical condition. She no longer screams inside her reservoir, but she is certainly still alive, and I am not yet ready to conclude the experiment."

traits.locale_text: "Örtüyle özellikle güçlü bir bağlantısı bulunması dışında, mon-keighlerde nadir görülen çok sayıda mutasyona ve hatta üçüncü bir göze sahip dişiyi mi diyorsun? Örtüden ve dış dünyadan tamamen izole olmasının, numunenin yeteneklerine, akıl sağlığına ve fiziksel durumuna etkilerini inceliyorum. Mahzeninden artık çığlıklar yükselmiyor ancak hâlâ hayatta olduğu kesin ve henüz deneyimi sonlandırmaya hazır değilim."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
